channel.title: Mi 11 Lite 4G MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Mi 11 Lite 4G MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI V12.5.2.0.RKQINXM Recovery update for Mi 11 Lite 4G India
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Mi 11 Lite 4G India

Codename: courbet

Version: V12.5.2.0.RKQINXM | 11.0

Size: 2.9 GB

MD5: ab17538bd037249c7e945c7f5f44bc7d

Changelog:
[Highlights]
MIUI 12.5. Yours alone.
[System]
New: Response to gestures is now instant.
New: With 20 times more rendering power, there are now few limits to what you can see on your screen.
New: With custom device model adjustments, any phone becomes faster after the upgrade.
Optimization: MIUI became lighter, faster, and more durable.
Optimization: Updated Android Security Patch to August 2021. Increased system security.
[Notes]
New: A gesture shortcut now allows you to create notes, tasks, and excerpts anywhere.
New: Excerpts save text, URLs, and images to Notes in a few simple taps.
New: Dynamic layouts bring the typography in Notes to a new level.
New: Compose mind maps with complex structures.
New: New tools for doodling and sketching.
New: Press and hold a sketch to adjust the strokes automatically.
All-new Notes.

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here

New: A gesture shortcut now allows you to create notes, tasks, and excerpts anywhere.
New: Excerpts save text, URLs, and images to Notes in a few simple taps.

New: Compose mind maps with complex structures.
New: New tools for doodling and sketching.
New: Press and hold a sketch to adjust the strokes automatically.

item.title: MIUI V12.5.6.0.RKQMIXM Fastboot update for Mi 11 Lite 4G Global
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Mi 11 Lite 4G Global

Codename: courbet

Version: V12.5.6.0.RKQMIXM | 11.0

Size: 5.4 GB

MD5: 02669ffbf36d96e8709380d9433e6c10

Changelog:
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to September 2021. Increased system security.
[Lock screen]
New: New fingerprint options
Fix: Using Face unlock and Fingerprint unlock simultaneously led to crashes in some cases
[Status bar, Notification shade]
Optimization: Third party theme compatibility for Notification shade
Optimization: Dark mode adjustments for notifications
Fix: Notifications weren't displayed correctly when App lock was used
Fix: Cleaner animations weren't displayed correctly
Fix: Notification shade couldn't be opened in some cases
Fix: Player controls weren't always displayed in the Notification shade
Fix: Notifications weren't always displayed correctly when "Raise to wake" was used
Fix: Buttons weren't always displayed correctly on the notifications when Dark mode was on

Download: Here
